input.sentences: my graduation ceremony was finally here .
all my friends were excited | but still a bit nervous .
some of my friends were having more fun then others .
people were celebrating in all sorts of fun | kooky ways .
at the end of the day i was just glad to be with my family .
output.sentences: Graduation day was finally here and we all couldn't wait for the ceremony to begin.
I and my friends and family, we were all so nervous and so excited.
After we got our diplomas and tossed our hats, it was time to have fun with friends.
All sorts of people attended the graduation and things did get a little bit kooky.
I love my friends, but I was so glad to have my family with me as well, for the big day.
